items.title: Asteroid Blaster
items.text: This is a twin-stick shooter web-browser based game, where the user pilots a space craft which must traverse through an asteroid field. The game has three difficulties and will keep track of your ship durability, score and time survived.

items.title: Have A Good Laugh
items.text: Website for local music festival, containing ticket sales portal, videos, images along with some nice animations.

items.title: Audiopile
items.text: E-commerce website for local record store, containing thousands of items and a customized organizational system. The site back-end also features real-time synching with store inventory, and automated tax system.

items.title: Weather App
items.text: A web application which allows you to retrieve the weather from any city in the world, along with that it will retrieve a nice image of said city.

items.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
items.text: Classic game of tic-tac-toe, browser-based game.

items.title: Bouncy Ball
items.text: A class project I created to learn Babylon.js, where the player controls a bouncy ball which can knock around other objects in a room.

items.title: Cafe Page
items.text: A fake cafe website I created for fun and I really liked the way it turned out so I decided to share!

items.title: Kitty Generator
items.text: A class project, which allows the user to create custom kitties to spawn on a geometric scene.

items.title: Messenger Program
items.text: A java program which allows users to messages to one another, using a graphical UI.
